metadata.title: USN-4921-1 -- libcaca vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libcaca incorrectly handled certain images. An attacker could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-4921-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  caca-utils - 0.99.beta19-2ubuntu0.16.04.2 libcaca-dev - 0.99.beta19-2ubuntu0.16.04.2 libcaca0 - 0.99.beta19-2ubuntu0.16.04.2 No subscription required
